channel.title: Anyone know how to place static text on the
channel.description: Anyone know how to place text on-screen in-game at the top of the screen? Something that shows how many players are online?

item.title: Anyone know how to place static text on the
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

It worked but when i go into the game it pops up my help menu… i look at the top of it and it says how many player are online… soooo[br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 12:06:39 PM[/size][hr]wait nvm i got it… but now it says

… of the Reward left!

item.title: Anyone know how to place static text on the
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@whi@ youreservername", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572); SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm"); String date = sdf.format(new Date()); sendFrame126("@yel@" + date, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

get rid of the date
so

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@whi@ youreservername", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

add that

item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

thnz i’ll try it[br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2007, 09:37:17 PM[/size][hr]3 errors:

client.java:16: cannot find symbol
symbol  : class SimpleDateFormat
location: class client
                SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm");
                ^
client.java:16: cannot find symbol
symbol  : class SimpleDateFormat
location: class client
                SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm");
                                           ^
client.java:17: cannot find symbol
symbol  : class Date
location: class client
                String date = sdf.format(new Date());
                                             ^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

?

item.source: Anyone know how to place static text on the

item.title: Anyone know how to place static text on the
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

wath i ownz i said is right i will make it easy for you

first off all find youre client java and open

second off all search for a code like this

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

should be in the beginning

then after the last { press enter

then add

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@whi@ youreservername", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572); SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm"); String date = sdf.format(new Date()); sendFrame126("@yel@" + date, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

ok close down save and compile

now run server

and in game you should see

  1. youreservername
  2. playerson.
  3. datum

Read full topic
